item.title: 关于 Photoshop 的学习
item.description: 我接触 Photoshop (PS) 大概已经一年了，在此期间断断续续地学了一些东西，也教了一些身边的朋友去使用 PS。为了方便别人和自己，之前写过一些教程，不过效果并不

About Experience does for the soul, education does for the mind. Hello, here is Chuanbo HUA. I am now an undergraduate student, majoring in Information & Computing Science (HIT) and Computer Science & Engineering (POSTECH). I am going to enroll in KAIST, majoring in Industry & System Engineering, focusing on Graphic Neural Network Optimization. I enjoy both mathematics and computer science and have worked in HIT Computer Network Technology Lab (supervised by Professor.
这里是我的朋友们。 Aengus | Blog - Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish. 一个非常优秀的学弟的网站，目前已入职 Byte Dance，未来可期。 idealclover - 是翠翠的个人网站！ 南大与我同级的本科生的网站，其 blog 在技术 & 生活方面的丰富与平衡是我向往的。
